query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
  nearbyAirports = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Malé International Airport', 'iataCode', 'MLE', 'distance', '30-45 min speedboat'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Gan International Airport', 'iataCode', 'GAN', 'distance', '2+ hours')
  ),
  nearbyDiveSites = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Kuda Giri', 'difficulty', 'Intermediate', 'distance', '15 min boat'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Keyodhoo', 'difficulty', 'Beginner', 'distance', '20 min boat'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Kuda Rah Thila', 'difficulty', 'Advanced', 'distance', '25 min boat')
  ),
  nearbySurfSpots = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Pasta Point', 'difficulty', 'Intermediate', 'distance', '10 min boat'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Chickens', 'difficulty', 'Beginner', 'distance', '15 min boat'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Honky Tonks', 'difficulty', 'Advanced', 'distance', '20 min boat')
  )
WHERE slug IN ('male-guide', 'maafushi-island', 'thoddoo-island', 'guraidhoo-island', 'thulusdhoo-island', 'kandooma-island');
